metadata.shortInfo: Clustered cDNAs from this species provided by NEMBASE that have been aligned to the genome using STAR. NEMBASE (http://www.nematodes.org/nembase4/) provides a resource for nematode transcriptome analysis, and a research tool for nematode biology, drug discovery and vaccine design, as part of the University of Edinburgh and Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute parasitic nematode EST programme.
